aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description:
BIM is above all a human adventure driven by a simple vision: to facilitate interactions by making meetings more authentic and more immersive thanks to video. Founded in July 2024 in Luxembourg, a cultural crossroads in the heart of Europe, our start-up is part of a dynamic of diversity and innovation.

 Our mission is to offer an alternative to traditional solutions by focusing on a unique behavioral algorithm. This is not limited to physical appearance or popularity, but analyzes user interactions and preferences to guarantee relevant encounters in line with their values.

 BIM is also a commitment to a caring community and secure. Thanks to reinforced community moderation and an effective reporting system, we ensure that each user can enjoy the application with complete peace of mind.

 We work tirelessly on the design, development and integration of new features , with a clear objective: to offer an intuitive, captivating and respectful user experience. Join us to participate in this revolution of online connections !

ourConcept.title: Our Concept
ourConcept.description:
**The dating social media**

 In a world where online interactions are becoming increasingly impersonal, BIM offers an innovative and human approach. Our application redefines social connections by combining the functionalities of a social network with the interactivity of dating applications, all entirely based on video.

 Here, no text, no filters: each interaction is done virtual face-to-face, promoting authentic and spontaneous exchanges. BIM changes the way we connect with others by offering an experience entirely centered on video exchange. Unlike traditional text-based applications, we favor virtual face-to-face meetings to enable more natural and authentic interactions. From your first connection, immerse yourself in a world where each exchange comes to life thanks to video. This interactive format promotes immediate communication, eliminates misunderstandings linked to the text and lets everyone's personality shine through in real time.

 We place safety and kindness at the heart of the experience. Thanks to advanced community moderation and reporting tools, we ensure a respectful environment where everyone can exchange freely with confidence. In addition, our behavioral algorithm analyzes your interactions and preferences to connect you with people who share your interests and values. This unique approach guarantees relevant and authentic encounters.

ourConceptDetails.title: Our Concept
ourConceptDetails.subtitle: The Dating Social Media
ourConceptDetails.description:
**Video for authentic encounters:**

 BIM is the meeting of a social network and a dating application. Discover a new universe built around video for more authentic encounters. We have created a space where you can be yourself and meet people according to your desires. No more misleading profiles and endless conversations via messages that lead nowhere. With BIM, you will be able to directly interact, hear and feel the true personality of the other from the beginning of your meetings. Our AI-based algorithm is designed to offer you experiences that will best match your expectations while learning from your past experiences.

The cherry on the cake is that we have added lots of features that will make your life easier in the application, but we'll let you discover them for yourself.

 **An AI based on behavioral analysis that takes into account each of your experiences:** 

 We have worked a lot on how to develop an AI that could reproduce dating situations as close to reality as possible. In real life, when you meet someone, you are attracted both by their appearance and their personality. Our behavioral AI takes into account interactions in the app to offer you people with affinities and values ​​that are closest to yours based on your past experiences. The more time you spend in BIM, the more refined profiles the AI ​​will offer you. 

 **A commitment to greater inclusivity:** 

 At BIM we are convinced that each person should be able to interact according to their choices and desires. Our platform is designed so that each gender has free access to the application in a caring and safe environment. At BIM, there is no discrimination or neglect of minorities. Make yourself comfortable, we'll take care of the rest. 

 **Security, the cornerstone of our concept:** 

 For us, security is our top priority. We have implemented robust security measures to ensure that every interaction on our platform is safe and enjoyable. We have implemented community moderation with strict rules that will exclude any user who is not in line with our ethical charter.

As a user, you can report any inappropriate or suspicious behavior. We believe in the power of the community to maintain a respectful and caring environment. 

 **Our watchwords: Kindness and tolerance:** 

 We've said it before but we'll say it again: we come here to have a good time and share. Kindness. Tolerance and openness to others allow us to meet great people and discover new horizons. 

So if you don't want to be tempted by our experience, we won't hold it against you. But don't stop others. We hope you find what you're looking for 😊

getStarted.title: Get Started
getStarted.description:
Now is the time to discover BIM and participate in the creation of our community. Pre-register today to benefit from completely free access to our application. You will thus become our ambassador to your contacts.

 Discover a new world where meetings take place on video, in an authentic and interactive way, without any financial commitment. Whether you're curious to explore new connections or ready to expand your network, this exclusive opportunity allows you to test all the app's features at no cost.

 Don't wait any longer: this offer is available for a period limited. Join us today to live the BIM experience !

Do you have a question, an idea for improvement or a point that you would like to bring to our attention? Our contact form below has been provided for this purpose.

You can also contact us by Whatsapp or send us a scented envelope to the address below.

We are committed to responding to all messages as quickly as possible, always with good humor and kindness.

Here, we share with you the highlights of our journey, from the creation of the company to the development of our application. You will be able to follow each key step, from the design of new features to our strategic partnerships, while getting a behind-the-scenes look at this entrepreneurial adventure. Join us in this quest to offer a new mode of communication thanks to BIM.

ourConceptDetails.title: Our Concept
ourConceptDetails.subtitle: Concept Subtitle
ourConceptDetails.description: This is the full description of our concept.

section1.title: The project is taking shape – Market studies completed and Beta ready
section1.description:
**December 2024 –** MERRY CHRISTMAS - A new step taken in our adventure. After several months of research, interviews and data analysis, we are proud to announce that our market research is finally completed.  This intense work allowed us to better understand the needs and expectations of our target, and to confirm the relevance of our concept. Obviously, 100% video can be surprising at first and it is not that widespread.

 With this solid base, we have also finalized our business plan. All the elements are there: a clear vision, precise objectives and a well-defined action plan. We now have a roadmap for the months to come, and the excitement is building. Alongside the development of the application and the necessary adjustments after the first Beta tests, we will focus on a major objective: raising funds. Having a secure, efficient and fast application requires funds and we must also anticipate our expansion outside of Europe. This fundraising will allow us to develop more quickly and integrate new options that we are still keeping secret for the moment.

 Over the past few months, we have worked intensively with our developers to refine every detail of the application. We have adjusted the model to make the user experience even more immersive and intuitive. Each feature has been tested and optimized to offer a quality of interaction that best reflects the essence of our concept. But the real big news is that **the Beta version of the application is ready!** After weeks of development and internal testing, failures, bugs, headaches, we are finally able to to propose a first functional version of BIM. This is a key moment for us: seeing our ideas come to life, being able to interact with an interface that was still a sketch a few months ago.

 Our development objective for the coming months is ambitious: integrating new options , including the possibility of making appointments for a first meeting directly via the application. Our initial motivation being to encourage physical encounters, the app should not be a goal but a tool so that you can experience a real moment around a drink or a restaurant with your contacts.

 To achieve this we will need to develop partnerships with local brands, such as bars and restaurants, in order to offer ideal locations for these meetings and further enrich your user experience.

 We look forward to sharing this Beta version with our first testers. The feedback will be valuable to further refine the user experience and ensure that BIM becomes the video connection tool we imagined. We also expect to fix more bugs that have managed to pass through our multiple reviews.

 The adventure continues, and each step brings us a little closer to our goal. Thank you to everyone who supports us – your enthusiasm motivates us more than ever. See you soon for the next news!

section2.title: The start of a journey – BIM is officially created!
section2.description:
**July 2024 –** A key date for BIM: our company is officially created! After months of reflection, ideas written down on paper and passionate discussions, we have finally taken this crucial step. BIM is no longer just a concept, it is now a structure ready to come to life. The brand is registered, the site is created and we are now officially “alive”.

 We first had to choose a country of residence to create our company and we chose Luxembourg. Why Luxembourg? Because it is a real cultural crossroads, in the heart of Europe. This strategic location allows us to be connected to a diversity of cultures and perspectives, which perfectly reflects the soul of BIM: an inclusive and universal platform.In addition, Luxembourg has an ultra dynamic economic environment and the arrangements for starting a business are simpler compared to other European countries. We will therefore be able to focus a little more on the app itself and a little less on the administrative part.

 In recent weeks, we have immersed ourselves in design and development. Finding a design that was both original and able to appeal to as many people as possible was a real challenge. We wanted to create a strong visual identity, which reflects our vision while being accessible and intuitive for our users. After numerous tests, adjustments and feedback, we believe we have found the perfect balance. Hoping that the Beta testers will appreciate the effort…Otherwise we will start again until we find the right formula. This is also entrepreneurship. The creation of the company marks a turning point in this adventure. There is still a long way to go, but we are ready to take on all the challenges to bring BIM to life. 

Of course, things don't always go smoothly. Technical obstacles, complex decisions and unforeseen adjustments are part of everyday life. But each step brings us a little closer to our goal. With every meeting, prototype and adjustment, BIM takes shape. 

 At the same time, we have been working on solutions to ensure a secure user experience.As the issue of online safety is crucial, we have implemented a community moderation system combined with an effective reporting mechanism. This system seems to us to be a solid option for creating a respectful and protected environment. Here again it will be necessary to review the users to see if this approach was the right one. 

 We will keep you informed of our next progress. Next target: The finalization of the Beta test and the various studies.

hero.title: PRE REGISTER
hero.description: Be among the first to discover the BIM experience by completing the pre-registration form.  By pre-registering, you will benefit from exclusive access to our application as soon as it launches. Don't miss this chance to be among the pioneers of a new era of online dating based on video and authenticity. Join us and let's build a unique and caring community together.

content.title: Join us today by pre-registering for BIM!
content.description:
You are invited to pre-register to be one of the first BIM users. Nothing could be simpler, fill out the form opposite. This does not commit you to anything and it is completely free.  This exclusive step allows you to discover, before anyone else, a new way of connecting thanks to 100% video, authentic and immersive exchanges.

 As a pre-registered person, you will benefit from free access to the application from its launch and will be able to actively participate in its development by sponsoring your loved ones.  Your feedback will be essential to refine the user experience and integrate the features that will make BIM an essential platform. This pre-registration is also an opportunity to join an innovative and caring community, ready to revolutionize social interactions. Don't miss this unique opportunity to be one of the pioneers and contribute to an adventure that promises to be exciting !

- presentation of a mobile application 

 

- form contact details 

 

- presentation of a company 

 

 The site is accessible free of charge anywhere to any User with Internet access. All costs incurred by the User to access the service (computer hardware, software, Internet connection, etc.) are their responsibility.

articles.title: DATA COLLECTION
articles.description:
The website ensures that the User collects and processes personal information while respecting privacy in accordance with Law No. 78-17 of January 6, 1978 relating to data processing, files and freedoms. 

 Under the Data Protection Act, dated January 6, 1978, the User has the right to access, rectify, delete and oppose their personal data. The User exercises this right by email to the email address: contact@bim-dating.com

articles.title: INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
articles.description:
The brands, logos, signs as well as all the contents of the site (texts, images, sound, etc.) are subject to protection by the Intellectual Property Code and more particularly by copyright.

The Bim brand is a trademark registered by BIM Group SARLS. Any representation and/or reproduction and/or partial or total exploitation of this brand, of any nature whatsoever, is totally prohibited.

The User must request prior authorization from the site for any reproduction, publication, copy of the different contents. It undertakes to use the contents of the site in a strictly private context, any use for commercial and advertising purposes is strictly prohibited.

Any total or partial representation of this site by any means whatsoever, without express authorization of the operator of the website would constitute an infringement punishable by article L 335-2 et seq. of the Intellectual Property Code.

It is recalled in accordance with article L122-5 of the Intellectual Property Code that the User who reproduces, copies or publishes protected content must cite the author and their source.

articles.title: RESPONSIBILITIES
articles.description:
The sources of information distributed on the site http://www.bim-dating.com are deemed reliable but the site does not guarantee that it is free from defects, errors or omissions.

The information communicated are presented for informational and general purposes without contractual value. Despite regular updates, the site http://www.bim-dating.com cannot be held responsible for the modification of administrative and legal provisions occurring after publication. Likewise, the site cannot be held responsible for the use and interpretation of the information contained in this site.

The site http://www.bim-dating.com cannot be held responsible possible viruses which could infect the Internet user's computer or any computer equipment, following use, access, or downloading from this site.

The site cannot be held liable in the event of force majeure or unforeseeable circumstances and insurmountable by a third party.

articles.title: HYPERTEXT LINKS
articles.description: Hypertext links may be present on the site. The User is informed that by clicking on these links, he will leave the site http://www.bim-dating.com. The latter has no control over the web pages on which these links lead and cannot, under any circumstances, be responsible for their content.

articles.title: COOKIES
articles.description:
The User is informed that during his visits to the site, a cookie may be automatically installed on his browser software.

Cookies are small files temporarily stored on the hard drive of the User's computer by your browser and which are necessary for the use of the site http://www.bim-dating.com. Cookies do not contain personal information and cannot be used to identify anyone. A cookie contains a unique identifier, randomly generated and therefore anonymous. Some cookies expire at the end of the User's visit, others remain.

The information contained in cookies is used to improve the site http://www.bim-dating.com.

 By browsing the site, the User accepts them. The User must, however, give consent to the use of certain cookies. Failing acceptance, the User is informed that certain functionalities or pages may be refused.

The User may disactivate these cookies via the settings in their browser software.

articles.title: APPLICABLE LAW AND COMPETENT JURISDICTION
articles.description:
French legislation applies to this contract. In the event of no amicable resolution of a dispute arising between the parties, the French courts will have sole jurisdiction to hear it.

For any questions relating to the application of these T&Cs, you can contact the publisher at the contact details listed in ARTICLE 1.

cookies.title: We respect your privacy
cookies.description: We use cookies that are strictly necessary for the proper functioning of this platform, cookies that allow us to perform performance analysis and usage statistics, as well as cookies shared with partners to enable interaction with content providers.
